welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kayseri, a city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in the charm of our city and enjoy all that it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Kafkas Mutfagı

restaurants.address: sahabiye mahallesi ahmet paşa caddesi  Vakıfbank yanı (ahmet paşa caddesi), 38000 Kayseri
